name: NiceBot
0:
”Alexa, tell Nice Bot to give me a compliment”
”Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment about my friend”
”Alexa, open Nice Bot and give me a compliment”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nice bot
des:
Feeling blue? Need a pick-me-up? You can ask Nice Bot for a compliment or something nice. You can also ask Nice Bot for a compliment about someone or something like "Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment for my wife.".

Nice Bot just wants to cheer you up!

Example Phrases
Alexa, tell Nice Bot to give me a compliment.
Alexa, ask Nice Bot to say something nice.
Alexa, give me a compliment from Nice Bot.
Alexa, tell Chris something nice from Nice Bot.
Alexa, open Nice Bot and give me a compliment.
Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment about my wife.
Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment about a banana.
Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment about my dog.
Alexa, ask Nice Bot for a compliment about Sarah.

Nice Bot uses a unique form of language generation to produce a compliment. We're working to make Nice Bot more conversational. Let us know what you think!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
